sentences.en: He wore a faded red flannel shirt.
sentences.cn: 他身穿一件褪了色的红色法兰绒衬衫。

sentences.en: Her finger traced the checkered pattern of their flannel sheets.
sentences.cn: 她的手指描绘出法兰绒被单上的方格图案.

sentences.en: Her glance swept over that sea of coloured flannel blouses of the audience.
sentences.cn: 她扫视了台下一片色彩缤纷的法兰绒外套.

sentences.en: Her glance swept over that sea of coloured flannel blouses, with bobbing pink faces and hands.
sentences.cn: 她扫视了台下一片色彩缤纷的法兰绒外套, 蠕动着的淡红色的脸和手.

sentences.en: I always wear flannel next my skin.
sentences.cn: 我常穿法兰绒做贴身衣.

sentences.en: I shall wear white flannel trousers, and walk upon the beach.
sentences.cn: 我将穿着白色法兰绒裤子, 漫步在海滩上.

sentences.en: Mother ape mask, to leave shape to flannel production.
sentences.cn: 母猿面具, 为假形,以绒布制作.

sentences.en: Never wear tweed coat and flannel trousers.
sentences.cn: 千万不要穿花呢上衣配法兰绒裤.

sentences.en: She always wears a grey flannel trousers.
sentences.cn: 她总是穿一条灰色法兰绒长裤.

sentences.en: She bought a gray flannel coat.
sentences.cn: 她买了件灰色的法兰绒外套.

sentences.en: She was looking luscious in a flannel shirt.
sentences.cn: 她穿着法兰绒裙子,看上去楚楚动人.

sentences.en: The center layer is yellow, back is green flannel.
sentences.cn: 中心层是黄色的, 背面是绿色的绒布.

sentences.en: We quote you for the flannel at 15 s . 4 d . per piece.
sentences.cn: 兹向贵方报价. 法兰绒每匹为15先令4便士.

sentences.en: Wipe off any excess make-up with a clean, moist cotton flannel.
sentences.cn: 用干净的湿绒布擦去多余的化妆品。

words.tran_cn: [纺]法兰绒；法兰绒衣服；法兰绒巾

phrases.tran_cn: 法兰绒衬衫；法兰绒上衣

trans.tran_cn: 法兰绒，绒布，法兰绒衣服，毛巾，<俚>花言巧语
trans.tran_en: soft cloth, usually made of cotton or wool, used for making clothes

trans.tran_cn: 给…穿上法兰绒衣服；用法兰绒包
